verses.text: Thus hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* unto me; and, behold, he \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* \w grasshoppers|strong="H1462"\w* in the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of the shooting \w up|strong="H5927"\w* of the latter \w growth|strong="H3954"\w*; and, lo, \add it was\add* the latter \w growth|strong="H3954"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w mowings|strong="H1488"\w*.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft grasshoppers: or, green worms\f*

And it came to pass, \add that\add* when they had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* the \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, then I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*, I beseech thee: by whom shall \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*? for he \add is\add* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* for this: It shall not be, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

¶ Thus hath the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* unto me: and, behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* to \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* by \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and it \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*, and did eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w* a \w part|strong="H2506"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w cease|strong="H2308"\w*, I beseech thee: by whom shall \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*? for he \add is\add* \w small|strong="H6996"\w*.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* for this: This also shall not be, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.

¶ Thus he \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me: and, behold, the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* upon a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \add made\add* by a \w plumbline|strong="H0594"\w*, with a \w plumbline|strong="H0594"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, what \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou? And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, A \w plumbline|strong="H0594"\w*. Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, Behold, I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* a \w plumbline|strong="H0594"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: I will not \w again|strong="H3254"\w* pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w* them any more:

And the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w* shall be \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w*, and the \w sanctuaries|strong="H4720"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be laid \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*; and I will \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

¶ Then \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* hath \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against thee in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* is not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w bear|strong="H3557"\w* all his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

For thus \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H1540"\w* be led away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* out of their own \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.

Also \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, O thou \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*, \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, flee thee \w away|strong="H1272"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and there \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* there:

But \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* not \w again|strong="H3254"\w* any more at \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*: for it \add is\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w chapel|strong="H4720"\w*, and it \add is\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4467"\w* \w court|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft chapel: or, sanctuary\f*\f + \fr 7.13 \ft king’s court: Heb. house of the kingdom\f*

¶ Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Amos|strong="H5986"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Amaziah|strong="H0558"\w*, I \add was\add* no \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, neither \add was\add* I a \w prophet’s|strong="H5030"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; but I \add was\add* an \w herdman|strong="H0951"\w*, and a \w gatherer|strong="H1103"\w* of sycomore \w fruit|strong="H8256"\w*:\f + \fr 7.14 \ft sycomore…: or, wild figs\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* me as I \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* unto my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.  +  r 7.15  t as…: Heb. from behind *

¶ Now therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: Thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* not against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w drop|strong="H5197"\w* not \add thy word\add* against the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="H3446"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Thy \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* shall be an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* shall be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* by \w line|strong="H2256"\w*; and thou shalt \w die|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* a \w polluted|strong="H2931"\w* \w land|strong="H0127"\w*: and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w surely|strong="H1540"\w* go into \w captivity|strong="H1540"\w* forth of his \w land|strong="H0127"\w*.
